title: Spot Trader Energy
description:
Mercury is a company with a great New Zealand heritage, and a leader in this country's electricity industry. Our core business is empowering New Zealand through our smarter energy. The electricity market in New Zealand is evolving, and we have an ambitious plan to deliver on the potential of our skills and experience, seize new opportunities and become part of the future growth of the industry. We're working together on some new things, in some different ways, and we need the right people to help us deliver.
